name: 斯蒂芬·霍金
bio_short: 英国理论物理学家、宇宙学家。他以其在“黑洞”和“奇点”理论上的突破性贡献而闻名，包括“奇点定理”（`penrose_singularity_1965`）和“霍金辐射”（`hawking_radiation_1974`）。
bio_short_en: An English theoretical physicist and cosmologist. He was renowned for his groundbreaking contributions to the theories of 'black holes' and 'singularities', including the 'singularity theorems' (`penrose_singularity_1965`) and 'Hawking radiation' (`hawking_radiation_1974`).
